name: Thunder Brawl
description: Thunder Brawl P2E economy revolves around $THB, and Royalty NFTs card. Choose fun & simple ways to profit for yourself! There are currently two games in the ecosystem: Dystopian and Thunder Roulette. Players can earn a handsome income by just playing these games and completing the challenges. We are struggling hard to introduce new games as early as possible to enhance the user experience of the platform.
